content.title: Delete Network Zone in PAN-OS (v11.0+)
content.summary: Deletes an existing network zone in a specified configuration scope such as 'vsys'. The zone name must be provided in the 'name' query parameter along with a valid scope.

required_query_parameters.location: Specifies the configuration scope, such as 'vsys' or 'shared'.
required_query_parameters.vsys: Required when location is 'vsys'. Example: vsys1.
required_query_parameters.name: The name of the zone to delete.

common_errors: 400: Missing or invalid query parameters (location, vsys, or name)
404: Zone not found in the specified scope
